SYSLOG_SERVER_TEST.desc: Load syslog server table with ipv4 address as syslog servers.

SYSLOG_SERVER_1_NEG_TEST.desc: Load syslog server table with empty address as syslog server.

SYSLOG_SERVER_2_NEG_TEST.desc: Load syslog server table with ipv6 address as syslog server.

SYSLOG_SERVER_INVALID_IPADDR_TEST.desc: Load syslog server table with invalid ipv4 address as syslog server.
